name: Riverside Back-In 30A
policySummary: Free cancel ≥72h before check-in; otherwise first night penalty.
description: Shaded site near the river. Compact rigs recommended.

name: Pull-Through 50A Premium
policySummary: Free cancel ≥72h; 1st night penalty inside window.
description: Easy access pull-through with full hookups.

name: Economy Back-In (No Sewer)
description: Budget site with water and power only.
